item.description: It’s a great event to meet new people in a relaxed comfortable setting.  We’ll eat, play games, or just hang out.  Bring your favorite game, appetizer or dessert to share, dress casual.  Dues paying Members $5, Guests $10.  To  reserve, call Gail at 860-582-8229.  Directions to 35 Anthony Drive:  I‑84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 1 (Rt. 177), right onto North Washington Street, at 2nd light left onto Northwest Drive, at end right onto Camp Street, left onto O'Sullivan Drive, at end turn right to stop, left onto Brace Avenue, left onto Anthony Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Game Night
